summary: This document is a memorandum from Joseph A. Califano, Jr., to Captain E. R. Zumwalt, Jr., Major General J. D. Alger, Rear Admiral W. Wendt, Major General J. W. Carpenter, III, and Brigadier General W. K. Jones regarding actions taken during July-August 1963 to curb Cuban subversion in Latin America. It includes a report of the Subcommittee on Subversion and discusses control of travel to and from Cuba, movement of Cuban propaganda, clandestine movement of guerrillas and arms, transfer of funds, strengthening of counter-insurgency capabilities, exchange of intelligence on Cuban subversion, and surveillance of Cuban diplomatic, commercial, and cultural missions.
tags: Travel of Latin Americans to Cuba
Interdepartmental Coordinating Committee of Cuban Affairs
title: ICCCA: Actions Taken During July-August 1963 in Curbing Cuban Subversion
